description:
Overcooked http://anidb.net/ch16839 [Pesu].
After Pesu escaped, http://anidb.net/ch1162 [Gintoki], http://anidb.net/ch1164 [Kagura] and http://anidb.net/ch1163 [Shinpachi] got stuck in the jar that was supposed to lure Pesu out and rolled down the hill, flattening Pesu in process. They brought back Pesu to http://anidb.net/ch1677 [Prince Hata] and http://anidb.net/ch1655 [Hasegawa] and were told cooking it in hot water will bring it to its normal size. Kagura, however, boiled it in a big pot of water, making it grow large. Pasu went on a rampage and was killed shortly after by Gintoki.
name: Pesu
